Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstantClass, ConstantDouble, ConstantFloat, ConstantInteger, ConstantLong, ConstantNameAndType, ConstantRef, ConstantString, ConstantUtf8
public abstract class GenericConstant
extends java.lang.Object
implements RuntimeConstants

an abstract base class for the different types of constants
